The videoInput library was written by Evgeny Pereguda and published together with a CodeProject article:

"Capturing Live-video from Web-camera on Windows 7 and Windows 8" 
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/776058/Capturing-Live-video-from-Web-camera-on-Windows-an

The code was released under "The Code Project Open License (CPOL) 1.02"
http://www.codeproject.com/info/cpol10.aspx
